properties.description: ClaxtonBird presents a 3-bed detached house in Eaton Rise, South Norwich. No onward chain, 3 ground floor reception rooms, kitchen, and shower room. First floor: 3 bedrooms, bathroom. Large garden, driveway, garage. Near Marston Marsh Nature Reserve, with local transport to City Centre. Requires updating.
properties.location: Townsend Road, Eaton Rise, Norwich, NR4

properties.description: Periodic charm abounds in this well-proportioned house featuring sash windows, cornicing, and fireplaces. Elegant entrance, sitting room with gas fire, dining room with bay window, glass sliding doors to kitchen. Spacious basement with conversion potential.

Nestled in the heart of Edinburgh's historic Old Town, Wallace & Co. offers a charming 2-bedroom flat. Original features, open-plan living, and modern kitchen. Within walking distance to the Royal Mile and Edinburgh Castle.

Introducing a stylish 2-bedroom flat in the heart of London's Kensington. Modern open-plan living, en-suite bathrooms, and a private balcony with city views. Close proximity to Hyde Park, high-end shopping, and excellent transport links.

ClaxtonBird proudly introduces a spacious 6-bedroom residence situated in the heart of Market Square, Cambridge. This impressive detached house offers a seamless blend of classic charm and modern convenience, providing an ideal living space for families or those seeking generous accommodation.
